BOOLEAN AudioActiveReference::SetVolume (  VolumeLevel  val  ) 
 

Sets MMI volume.

Parameters:
val The desired volume - the valid range is between 0 and 100. Setting the value 0 means silent.
Returns:
TRUE if successful
